targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, 'Delivery Units' AS metric, delivery_units AS value FROM stats.user_metrics_daily WHERE identity_id = '$identity_id' AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) ORDER BY day

SELECT day AS time, 'LOC Touched' AS metric, loc_touched AS value FROM stats.user_metrics_daily WHERE identity_id = '$identity_id' AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) ORDER BY day

SELECT day AS time, 'Cycle Time P50 (Hours)' AS metric, cycle_p50_hours AS value FROM stats.user_metrics_daily WHERE identity_id = '$identity_id' AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) ORDER BY day

SELECT day AS time, 'WIP Active' AS metric, work_items_active AS value FROM stats.user_metrics_daily WHERE identity_id = '$identity_id' AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) ORDER BY day

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT identity_id FROM stats.user_metrics_daily ORDER BY 1
list.name: identity_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT identity_id FROM stats.user_metrics_daily ORDER BY 1
